pullRequest.title: Improve parsing of data copying rules
pullRequest.bodyText: In particular, this allows spaces to appear within quotation marks. Basically, this is more stable against leading, double or trailing spaces. Still, a space is needed between the segments.

nodes.bodyText: please give a more descriptive name. what are you parsing and what are you parsing it for?

commit.message: Improve parsing of data copying rules
